code: import React from'react';import moment from'moment';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var MONTHS=moment.months();function MonthSelector(props){var onSelectMonth=props.onSelectMonth;function handleChange(e){var selected=e.target.value;onSelectMonth(selected);}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{marginBottom:20},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Select month "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("select",{value:props.selected,onChange:handleChange,children:MONTHS.map(function(month,index){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("option",{value:index,children:[" ",month," "]},index);})})]});}export{MonthSelector};
